questions.clue: This Korean director won the Palme d'Or and multiple Oscars for his film 'Parasite'.
Known for his film 'Oldboy', this director is celebrated for vivid storytelling and unique Korean noir.
'The Handmaiden', a film by this director, pulls inspiration from the novel 'Fingersmith' and depicts complex human desires.
Korean director Kim Ki-duk gained international fame with visually stunning films like 'Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring'.
This avant-garde director's film 'Memories of Murder' examines an unsolved crime case and was inspired by a real-life series of murders.

categories.name: Navigating the High Seas: A History of European Sailing

questions.clue: In 1492, this Italian explorer set sail under the Spanish flag to find a route to Asia, but instead reached the Americas.
Portuguese navigator Vasco da Gama found a sea route to India in this year, opening the way for an age of global imperialism.
In 1519, this explorer began the first known circumnavigation of the globe, though he was killed in the Philippines before completing the voyage.
The Treaty of Tordesillas, signed in 1494, divided the newly discovered lands outside Europe between these two maritime powers.
This Dutch explorer, hired by the British, sought the Northeast Passage and discovered lands including what is now known as New York, naming the Hudson River.
This player, often referred to as 'The Great One', holds the record for the most career points in NHL history.
In 1998, this California-based NHL team was named after a famous Disney movie about a youth hockey team.
This Montreal Canadiens player, also known as 'The Rocket', was the first to score 50 goals in 50 games.
The Stanley Cup, awarded annually to the NHL champion, was first given in this year.
This player's triple gold club membership includes an Olympic gold medal, IIHF World Championship gold, and a Stanley Cup victory.

categories.name: Inside Silicon Valley: Tech Hubs & Innovators

questions.clue: This popular search engine's headquarters, also known as the Googleplex, is located in Mountain View.
Named after this early Portuguese explorer, and featured in a famous racing video game, this valley hub is home to many startups.
This city, known nowadays for being home to a top computer company, shares its name with a legendary soccer team.
This university near Palo Alto, renowned for engineering and tech, hosts an annual sailing regatta named after its stadium.
Known for sparring in digital and legal battles, this social media platform's HQ is set in Menlo Park, its name reminding some of a close combat sport.
For 200, this anime features the intense battles of Ippo Makunouchi as he climbs the ranks of boxing.
For 400, this anime blends hockey with psychological drama, centering around the relationship between Haru and Maki.
For 600, Eijun Sawamura works to become the ace pitcher of Seido High in this baseball-centric anime.
For 800, this anime features Rikishi Toru and the pride of Koreatown in a story where boxing meets Korean drama.
For 1000, set in a dystopian Tokyo, this anime follows a squad fighting massive monsters called NOVA, mixed with an intriguing geolocation twist with ties to Seoul.

final.clue: This South Korean film, winner of the 2020 Academy Award for Best Picture, shares its name with a key strategy in hockey used when a team pulls the goalie for an extra attacker.
